title: The Week of Yvonne Price: Super Coach
summary: Yvonne Price, a 71-year-old retired superhero, uses her coaching skills to empower her community, facing challenges and eventually stopping a robbery with her strategic wisdom.
summaryGerman: Yvonne Price, eine 71-jährige pensionierte Superheldin, nutzt ihre Coaching-Fähigkeiten, um ihre Gemeinde zu stärken, stellt sich Herausforderungen und verhindert letztendlich mit ihrer strategischen Weisheit einen Raub.
summaryDutch: Yvonne Price, een 71-jarige gepensioneerde superheldin, gebruikt haar coachingsvaardigheden om haar gemeenschap te versterken, gaat uitdagingen aan en voorkomt uiteindelijk met haar strategische wijsheid een overval.
summaryFrench: Yvonne Price, une super-héroïne retraitée de 71 ans, utilise ses compétences de coach pour renforcer sa communauté, relève des défis et empêche finalement un vol grâce à sa sagesse stratégique.

story.text: Yvonne starts her week reflecting on her long-past superhero days and decides to use her coaching skills to guide the local youth soccer team.
Energized by yesterday's decision, Yvonne holds her first training session, infusing the team with her superhero ethic of hard work and determination.
Suspicious activities at the local park catch Yvonne’s sharp eye during a jog. She decides to keep watch, utilizing her old superhero vigilance.
Yvonne uses her coaching session to teach the kids about teamwork and vigilance, hinting about the suspicious activities without causing alarm.
Her suspicion confirmed, Yvonne notices the same suspicious individuals planning something at the park. She calls the police and decides to be there just in case.
The robbery attempt unfolds. Yvonne, with her strategic positioning, helps the police capture the culprits by directing kids in a mock soccer drill to block the escape routes.
Celebrating the successful prevention of a crime, Yvonne feels rejuvenated and respected, realizing she still can protect her community in her own unique way.

ending: At 71, Yvonne Price learned that heroes come in all ages and forms, and that one's passion, like coaching, can truly make a difference.
moral: True heroism is about using one's unique abilities to make a difference, regardless of age or past.
